title: Seth Meyers
summary: Seth Adam Meyers (born December 28, 1973)[1] is an American comedian, writer, producer, actor, and television host. He hosts Late Night with Seth Meyers, a late-night talk show on NBC. Prior to that, he was a cast member and head writer for NBC's Saturday Night Live (2001â€“2014) and hosted the show's news parody segment, Weekend Update.
